articles.title: Postcards praising President Kim Il Sung mailed in S. Korea
Preparatory committees for commemorating Sun's Day formed abroad
articles.content:
Postcards praising President Kim Il Sung mailed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Postcards carrying deep reverence for President Kim Il Sung were delivered to dwelling houses in Yongdo and Tongrae districts to commemorate his 86th birthday, the Seoul-based radio Voice of National Salvation quoted the Pusan city committee of the National Democratic Front of South Korea as saying.
   The postcards were mailed in the name of the Paektu society.
   Printed on their upper part was a picture of President Kim Il Sung in Generalissimo's uniform, surrounded by 86 magnolia blossoms symbolic of his 86th birth anniversary. On the lower part were letters reading "Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, ever-victorious brilliant commander".
   Written on the back side were letters "Generalissimo Kim Il Sung is always with our nation" against majestic Mt. Paektu, a holy mountain of the nation.

articles.title: National art exhibition opens to commemorate Sun's Day
articles.content:
Preparatory committees for commemorating Sun's Day formed abroad
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Preparatory committees for commemorating Sun's Day were formed in Belgium and Finland on March 30 and 31 respectively.
   The Secretary General of the Belgium-Korea Solidarity Committee and Pekka Leppanen, Chairman of the Finland-Korea Society and member of parliament, were elected as Chairmen of the committees.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on ill-boding military moves in S. Korea
articles.content:
National art exhibition opens to commemorate Sun's Day
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- A national art exhibition commemorating Sun's Day opened at the Korean art gallery on April 6 with due ceremony.
   Exhibited there are Korean paintings, oil paintings and posters showing undying revolutionary exploits and noble traits of President Kim Il Sung, the greatness of General Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary faith and heroic struggle of the Korean people and people's army soldiers faithful to his leadership, more than 190 art pieces in all.
   Included in the exhibits are Korean paintings "protracted bloody anti-Japanese war" and "mounting a burning height" and an oil painting "visiting workers of Kangson Steel Works" delineating immortal revolutionary exploits of the President.
   Also included are Korean paintings "We are the happiest children in the world" and "undying feats associated with a 40-kilometre-long water tunnel" dealing with the revolutionary activities of General Kim Jong Il and art pieces portraying mysterious natural phenomena and majestic and fantastic scenary of Mt. Paektu and the beautiful landscape of the country.
   Kim Ki Nam, Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, delivered an opening address.

articles.title: Korean cadres plant trees
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on ill-boding military moves in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today comments on the ill-boding military moves going on in South Korea these days.
   In a signed commentary entitled "for what are they continuously sending off the smell of powder?" the news analyst of the paper says:
   Sometime ago, the South Korean warmaniacs staged a large-scale tactical training in the area of Nam Hill in Seoul with the mobilisation of units belonging to the "army metropolitan defence command."
   Earlier, "special warfare" units of South Korea staged a war exercise against the north in the mountainous areas of north Jolla province similar to the mountainous areas of the northern half of Korea in topographical conditions. While in the exercise, six commandos died. This fact eloquently shows how frantically the exercise was held.
   Far from drawing a lesson from the past wrong confrontation policy, the present South Korean regime is rushing headlong along the road of confrontation and war against the north as its predecessor did. Its war rackets are little different from the "civilian"-veiled rulers' in their aspect and wildness.
   The South Korean ruling quarters must draw lessons from the disgraceful doom of the "civilian" warmaniacs and stop the war exercises against the north at once.
   It is no use crying over spilt milk.
   They must ponder over things before it is too late for regret.

articles.title: Pyongyang with Sun's Day just ahead
articles.content:
Korean cadres plant trees
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Senior party and government officials of the DPRK on Monday went to Ryongsong and Hyongjesan districts of Pyongyang, Phyongsong city of South Phyongan Province, Sariwon city of North Hwanghae Province and other parts of the country to plant trees with working people and students to mark the day of tree-planting. 
   Among them were DPRK vice-presidents Ri Jong Ok, Pak Song Chol and Kim Pyong Sik and secretaries of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee Kye Ung Thae, Han Song Ryong and Jon Pyong Ho.
   They planted a large number of trees such as pine, pine-nut and persimmon, recalling immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung, who opened a new history of land construction long ago and worked heart and soul to provide wealth for national prosperity and development and for happiness of the posterity.
   And they asked working people to effect a new turn in the afforestation and the implementation of their revolutionary duty by pushing ahead with the forced march for the final victory, encouraged by the torch kindled by General Kim Jong Il at the Songjin Steel Complex.

articles.title: Commemorations of Sun's Day in Russia and Cambodia
articles.content:
Pyongyang with Sun's Day just ahead 
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang is seething in a festive mood with Sun's Day (April 15) just ahead. On this occasion streets and workshops are garbed in festive attire.
   Squares and streets are bedecked with posters, slogans and decorations to commemorate Sun's Day.
   Different events are being briskly held at all units.
   Working people, soldiers of the people's army and school youth and children visit Mangyongdae where President Kim Il Sung was born and spent his childhood, and other revolutionary sites which are associated with his undying revolutionary feats.
   Gatherings and art performances praising his greatness and exploits are held at theatres and open-air stages.
   The "Mangyongdae Prize" sports tournament and other sports games are held at stadiums and gymnasiums.
   Parks and pleasure-grounds are booming with sports and folk games, songs and dances.
   Mangyongdae, Taesongsan, Kaeson Youth Park and Munsu  area fun-fairs are well arranged. And working people, students and schoolchildren are boating in Taedong and Pothong rivers.
   Flowers are in full bloom at crossroads, major intersecting points,  parks and pleasure-grounds in the capital.
   Traffic service is organized in a convenient way during the holiday. 
    Pyongyang is replete with revolutionary optimism and emotion on this occasion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on achieving great national unity
articles.content:
Commemorations of Sun's Day in Russia and Cambodia
Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Russian public circles for commemorating the 86th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung took place in Moscow on April 2 under the sponsorship of the Russian organizing committee of commemorations of Sun's Day.
   Aleksandr Kapto, Chairman of the Russian public circles committee for liaison with the DPRK, said in his report that President Kim Il Sung is an outstanding statesman, a prominent state activist, a genuine patriot and a great leader who performed undying feats for the Korean people and the progressive humankind of the world with his tireless ideological and theoretical activities and energetic guidance.
   "Comrade Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the progressive humankind of the world, will be immortal in the hearts of the contemporary people and the rising generations not only in the present century but in the 21st century and the ensuing century as the sun of humankind," he noted.
   Former Soviet Defence Minister Yazov, in his speech at the meeting, said that President Kim Il Sung is an iron-willed brilliant commander and the Generalissimo who defeated the two U.S. and Japanese imperialisms in one generation.
   A letter to General Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.
   A joint friendship meeting was held in Cambodia on the same day to commemorate Sun's Day.

articles.title: U.S. hit for its ambition for domination over Asia
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on achieving great national unity
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- If the aspirations and desire of the Korean people to enjoy a happy life in one prospering territory are to be realized at an early date, national concord and unity should be achieved.
   Rodong Sinmun today says this in a signed article headlined "great national unity, a matter of great concern to national reunification."
   The daily goes on:
   The Korean nation has a good political programme, the guideline of concord and unity.
   "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" put forward by President Kim Il Sung is a great programme and library of national unity, the most reasonable and realistic, that is acceptable to anyone who truly loves the country and the nation and wants the reunification of the country.    Clarified in the programme are the target and ideological basis of great national unity,  the principle and ways of unity.
   The Ten-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation is indeed a matter of great concern to national reunification and the banner of victory which should be held high in carrying out the cause of national reunification.
   The present situation in which the inter-Korean relations are at a new turning-point more urgently requires great unity of the Korean nation than anytime.
   The entire fellow countrymen in the north, south and abroad should give priority to the interests common to the nation and maintain the principle of unity on its basis, regardless of differences in ideology, idea and system.
   In order to achieve national reconciliation and unity under the banner of the ten-point programme, South Korea should renounce the policy of depending on outsiders and stop the suppression of pro-reunification patriotic forces. 
   South Korea should no longer pursue the flunkeyist treacherous politics of placing outsiders above the fellow countrymen and depending on outsiders.

articles.title: 25th anniversary of establishment of DPRK-Sweden diplomatic relations
articles.content:
U.S. hit for its ambition for domination over Asia
  Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S. argument about "Asian country," a sophistry of U.S.-centered thinking and concept, is a doctrine of aggression for monopolistic domination over Asia, says Rodong Sinmun in a signed article today.
    Commenting on the claim of the U.S. ruling quarters that the U.S. is a powerful country of Asia and that the U.S. is an Asian state from geographical, administrative and social point of view, the article says it is a far-fetched allegation.
   The U.S. is geographically in north America. In view of social life, the U.S. way of life is different from that of Asian countries. Asians and Americans are diametrically different from each other in race, customs and skin color, the article says, and goes on:
   The U.S. is pursuing the policy of interference in the internal affairs of Asia, clamouring for its identification with Asian countries. Because the U.S. has the power of life and death over South Korea, its colony, and regards Japan as an ally under its control and "an unsinkable aircraft carrier".
   The U.S. is trying to organise a "band" of some Asian countries with South Korea and Japan at core and become its conductor.
   The U.S. is attaching importance to the Asia policy, caused by its internal factor.
   Financial and economic crisis has recently swept Asia. 
   But the U.S. does not think that the strategic and economic status of Asia will be weakened in the future. This is why the U.S. is trying to realise its strategic interests in the region by disguising itself as "An Asian country."
   It is the U.S. strategic plan to establish a new order in Asia under the U.S. control and make Asian countries move according to its baton and will.
   The U.S. argument is a reactionary U.S.-centered doctrine on domination over Asia.    Never can it be justifiable in any case. Nor can the U.S. ambition for domination over Asia be realised.

articles.title: World Health Day marked
articles.content:
25th anniversary of establishment of DPRK-Sweden diplomatic relations
Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today observes the 25th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Sweden.
   The opening of ambassador-level diplomatic relations was an important occasion in deepening understanding  and developing friendship and cooperation between the peoples of Korea and Sweden, a signed article of the paper says, and goes on:
   The two countries, in the past 25 years, have made efforts to develop bilateral state relations and strengthen economic and cultural exchange on the basis of equality and mutual respect. The friendly relations between the two countries are ever developing on good terms. This is conducive to the building of a new society in the two countries.
   To further develop the friendly relations accords with the desire and interests of the two peoples.
   The friendly ties will further develop in the idea of independence, peace and friendship.

articles.title: For assured supply of water
articles.content:
World Health Day marked
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Dailies here today dedicate articles to world health day.
   Rodong Sinmun notes that the world health organization has coordinated cooperation among its member nations to develop comprehensive medical service, prevent and cure diseases and accelerate the study of biological medicine and health and thus contributed to the promotion of peoples' health.
   It says: 
   At present who is working hard to overcome worldwide problems threatening existence of mankind, through activities of renovating the "all-people health strategy" in conformity with the changed world environment and the trend of developing health service for the 21st century.
   Korea will as ever strengthen cooperation with who and thus make a great contribution to the sacred cause of protecting and promoting lives and health of mankind.

articles.title: Achievements in spring land administration
articles.content:
For assured supply of water
Pyongyang, April  7  (KCNA) -- A great deal of energy is being directed to the supply of more water needed for paddy farming in Korean rural areas.
   The rural communities in South Hamgyong Province have put a lot of effort into the solution of the water problem from the outset of the year with a view to having a good harvest this year, which coincides with the 50th anniversary of the DPRK.
   The Ponghung Cooperative Farm in Yonggwang county, the Kawon Cooperative Farm in Tanchon city and many other cooperative farms which had found difficulty in agricultural production last year owing to a long drought mapped out plans to build more reservoirs this year and pushed ahead with projects, thus providing a condition for securing 900 jongmi of more water than before (one jongmi is 10,000 cubic metres of water).
   The Unjong Cooperative Farm in Kumya county, the Unha Cooperative Farm in Hongwon county and the Pudong Cooperative Farm in Pukchong county enlarged more than 10 of their existing reservoirs to enable them to store 500 Jongmi of more water than last year.
    Meanwhile, the province saw to it that every cooperative farm pushed forward the provision of subsidiary water resources, such as small reservoirs and wells, to store a large amount of water.
   Unryul, Anak and Sinchon counties in South Hwanghae Province carried out projects for making dammed polls to obtain 7,000 jongmi of water.
   In Unryul county a 40-km-long waterway was built to supply irrigation water to 12 cooperative farms.
   In Kangnam county in Pyongyang 2,200-metre-long waterway is being cut in parallel with the construction of several culverts and pumping stations. When completed, the farm lands within the county will be supplied with enough water.

articles.title: DPRK's reunification proposals supported
articles.content:
Achievements in spring land administration
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Korea has registered  a signal success in March-April spring land administration.
    According to data available at the ministry of land and environmental protection,  412.2 million trees have been planted, 1,200-km-long rivers and  streams improved and 2,770-km-long roads repaired.
   North Phyongan, South Hwanghae and South Phyongan provinces have carried out their plans for river improvement and road repairing. Tree-planting  is in progress in these provinces.
   Over 14.3 million trees have been planted, 135 km rivers improved and 170,000 square metres of roads repaired in Pyongyang.
   Ryanggang, Jagang, and other provinces Nampho and other, cities and counties achieved successes in planting various kinds of trees of economic value and flowers and in river improvement and road repairing projects during the two months.

articles.title: Talks between Vice-Premier Kong Jin Thae and WFP Executive Director
articles.content:
DPRK's reunification proposals supported
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Uzbek President Islam Karimov supported all the initiatives of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea for the peaceful reunification of the country.
   When he received credentials from newly-appointed ambassador E.P. of the DPRK Kim Thae Sam, he said that Korea is one.
   He hoped that the Korean peninsula would be reunified in a peaceful way.
   He added that he would make all efforts to develop relations between the two countries.
